survey_name: Cloud Storage Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user behaviors, preferences, and satisfaction levels with cloud storage services to help providers improve their offerings.

questions.question_text: Which cloud storage service(s) do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice to allow respondents to select all applicable options. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unlisted services.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which cloud storage service(s) do you currently use?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using cloud storage?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to identify the main use case. Include an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using cloud storage?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary cloud storage service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected a service in Q1.
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to gauge satisfaction. Ensure the question specifies 'primary' service for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected a service in Q1.

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using cloud storage services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to uncover pain points. Keep the text box large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a large text input box.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using cloud storage services?

questions.question_text: How important is the security of your data when choosing a cloud storage service?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to assess the importance of security. Ensure the question is clear and concise.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How important is the security of your data when choosing a cloud storage service?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for enhanced security features in your cloud storage service?
answer_options: Maybe, depending on the features and cost

questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.
